name: Long Distance Touch Bracelet Set
top_review_headline: I would recommend this for those who have trust
top_review_comment: It lets you send little taps to your partner thru Bluetooth. Super cute and adorable, but if they leave it's only a reminder of someone who you trusted that betrayed you. Bringing all the more sorrow when it originally brought only pure joy.

name: Lovebox Spinning Heart Messenger
top_review_comment: This really is an awesome invention , I was searching for a perfect gift and I wanted it to be sweet, UNIQUE, and can make him smile and voila ! I found this! I'm sure it will continue to make us smile everyday despite our distance from each other.. I'm in Philippines and he is in US. Thank you so much for the brilliant mind of the creator of this ????????????

name: PhoneSoap Smartphone Sanitizer
top_review_comment: I purchased this gift to give to 5 docs who work in hospitals as a thank you gift. It was so well received, I bought 10 more to give as thank you gifts. This is for business.

name: Founding Fathers Whiskey Glasses
top_review_headline: Nice quality, love the red and black lettering
top_review_comment: For drinking whiskey and definitely a conversation starter. I look forward to buying all of the glasses so my son will have an attractive collection.

name: Personalized Retro Gamer Pint Glass
top_review_comment: Such a great, unique gift idea! This is a Christmas gift for my boyfriend who is big into video games. The proofing process was great and it was very easy to make some small changes, as I had accidentally chosen the wrong hairstyle. Really happy with the end product and I can't wait to give it to him!

This is especially special for us because of the British museum but I can see many science lovers cherishing this! #sweepstakes

But unfortunately that is difficult during the pandemic, and it's even more difficult for me to join her to do so as we live several states apart. I bought this as part of her birthday gift so she could have her own little craft and cocktail class at home. What a great gift for someone who likes to craft things and loves plants. And the quality is great for the price.

top_review_headline: Fun gift for a coworker working from home!

name: UDog Game
top_review_headline: Looking for something new and refreshing? This is the game!
top_review_comment: My family plays a lot of games ranging from card games to board games. We are also very competitive. I was truly trying to find a game that was different and exciting for my moms birthday this year. We have a big family and sometimes we struggle finding games that can play a large group of people that have strategy involved but we also like games that you can play with as few as two or even odd numbers. UDog is excellent for this as you can play with as few or as many as you'd like because you can assemble the board for however many are playing! It has strategy, keeps everyone engaged, and is a mix between a card and board game. It was truly refreshing! It's not to complicated that anyone could play but still has an element of strategy. This was an excellent addition to our game collection! I'm so glad I was able to find this!

name: Scenic Science of the National Parks
Political Buttons of America Puzzle
top_review_comment: DId it myself and passed on to friends as something to lighten the mood during the pandemic and election season.

name: Build Your Own Robot Kit
top_review_comment: Person who received it loves techo things and I felt this was a perfect little gizmo to put by his computer.

name: I Should Have Known That! Party Game
top_review_comment: The perfect game for trivia fanatics!

name: Eyeglasses Holder
top_review_headline: Great place to rest your specs
top_review_comment: Gift for my son - keeps them from getting sat on or buried under papers.

name: Super Magnetic Putty
top_review_comment: My 10 year old loves to play with play dough and my 15 yr old loves modeling clay. This is perfect for both and offers a unique feature b/c a magnetic stone is included. They have had a great time manipulating the clay and zero mess!

name: 3D Tic Tac Toe
top_review_comment: This was the perfect housewarming gift for my game-loving friend! Makes the perfect coffee table decoration too.

name: Heroic Women Museum Puzzle
top_review_comment: This was the perfect gift for my step mother who is very sick to do with her grand daugher.

name: Toggle Switch Plate
top_review_comment: I got this for my science loving husband. It looks great above his desk and is a great conversation piece. Makes us feel like we're mad scientists! #sweepstakes

name: The World of Frida Kahlo Puzzle
top_review_comment: My kids and I have really gotten into 1,000 piece puzzles during the pandemic. So this puzzle was a no-brainer for us since we love Frida Kahlo. With all the color variations, this was a beautiful puzzle, but not nearly as challenging as other 1,000-piece puzzles we do. While it typically takes us 4-5 days to finish the average puzzle of this size, we finished this one in 3 days. The quality was great and it includes a fold-out sheet of the image.

name: Video Games Collection Puzzle
top_review_headline: I would buy again! Challenging, but not impossible!
top_review_comment: This puzzle was perfect for my son who appreciates electronics, video games, and retro video. It was challenging, but not impossible. I would definitely buy again!

name: Dinosaur Mugs
top_review_headline: Beautiful, hefty, and just delightful to use.
top_review_comment: Using it for coffee. I received one as a gift (Triceratops) and loved it so much that I had to get another. It's made well, looks great, and holds a nice amount of coffee. I would happily recommend this to anybody looking for a nice mug as a gift or for themselves.

name: Around the World Brainteasers - Set of 5
top_review_headline: Keeping my kids off video games!
top_review_comment: I bought this for my son's birthday. It was a great way to keep him off of video games for a while. He liked it very much.

name: Personal Planetarium
top_review_comment: I cannot attest to how this product is used since it was a gift for someone else, but they seem to have no issues.

name: 1000 Colors Puzzle
top_review_comment: I had my eye on this puzzle for a while and I finally bought it. And I'm so glad I did! The color gradient is vibrant, the puzzle pice pattern is unique, and the quality is great! I did the puzzle over a weekend and I can't wait to do it again! #sweepstakes

name: Glowing Dinosaur Lamp
top_review_comment: Our grandson uses this lamp in his room as his nightlight. He loves it!

name: Periodic Table of Presidents
top_review_comment: This s going to be a Christmas gift.

name: Mini Creature 3D Kits
top_review_headline: Perfect project for kids and adults
top_review_comment: This was my third creature 3D kit (after unicorn and dragon). After helping my 7 YO with the unicorn (I enjoyed making the dragon myself), she requested the narwhal kit. She was able to complete it perfectly on her own, with great pride. The only help she needed was punching the pieces out of the cardboard. The only tricky part is to not use too much glue. The finished pieces are quite sturdy and look nice on our bookshelves. I'd love to see more critter options (like the sheep!)

name: Aurora Borealis Sand Art
top_review_headline: I'm buying a similar style in a few more years
top_review_comment: It's a great conversation starter.

name: 19th Amendment - Suffrage Mug
top_review_comment: great gift for anyone, especially in an election year

name: Placing the Past Game
top_review_headline: This is a really fun game
top_review_comment: Because it was created in the UK, there are several Australia-related questions that are tough for Americans, but that just adds to the fun. My entire family (husband and 3 teen and pre-teen boys) enjoyed playing this and everyone was able to contribute. We played in teams which I think added to the fun because there were intra-team discussions as well as the competition between teams.

name: Wooden Fractal Puzzle
top_review_comment: I thought this would take forever but you just start at the edges and work your way in. We like to time ourselves and beat our best score. The wood makes it so much more durable than a standard puzzle.

name: Mobi Math Game
top_review_comment: Three generations play for hours with this game. When we first opened it and read the directions, there was much discussion about it being too difficult, but when we began, everyone was able to participate excitedly. The youngest, five, made exponential growth in her number skills just by playing, and the seven-year-old, after his usual frustration with anything new, dove in. When the rest finally tired, he took the game to the corner of the table and continued playing alone. The element of competition is fun and bonding, but the way it is set up, everyone participates at their own skill level, and it's possible to see how far you can go on your own. This game makes numbers fun--and I'm not a number person. My daughter says the tiles are out all the time and that the kids play for hours.

name: Optical Illusions Science Kit
top_review_comment: My niece is a smarty at 9 years old so this looks perfect for her

name: Functional Pinwheel Spinner Earrings
top_review_comment: My wife the earrings, has received lots of compliments.

name: Personalized Constellation of Love
top_review_comment: This is a great conversation piece and can be made for any special date for you and a loved one. I was so pleased when it arrived it just is means a lot to both of us!

name: Lune Light
top_review_comment: Extremely pleased with this purchase

top_review_comment: Granddaughter loved this! The book is big and beautifully interested. Mazes are complex enough to keep her interested and she loved the stories.

name: Smartphone Magnifier
top_review_comment: I bought this product for a trip we were taking where there would be no TV. It seems to work great.

name: Mini Unicorn 3D Model Kit
top_review_comment: I bought this for myself along with other options from the same group. I bought this for myself and the other options for my grandchildren. It was easy to put together and lols exactly like I expected. Fun and easy!

name: Moving Locomotive Kit
top_review_headline: I can't wait to try the other kits!
top_review_comment: I loved building this train...it took me about 18 hours total to assemble and I'm so pleased with how it turned out. Not only do all the gears mesh perfectly for movement, it's also quite lovely and impressive sitting on my mantel. I would recommend using something to widen the holes for the toothpick pins, however...I used a tiny pick with a fine abrasive surface to make assembly a bit easier.

name: Writers vs. Writers Insults Chart
top_review_comment: Such a unique, special, and original gift for any literary lover. I was thrilled to find this when I was looking for a birthday gift for a friend who has a true love affair with all books of all kinds. I know she will smile each time she sees it, enjoying reading a new snippet each time she walks by. It is well-made and is perfect for wall art in a home library or reading room. Such a fantastic and fun idea!

name: Democracy Coasters - Set of 4
top_review_headline: I am very happy with this purchase.
top_review_comment: The coasters are very heavy and appear to be very durable. It is a fun gift item for many, but especially for a law school student, in my opinion.

name: Dinosaur Wine Bottle Stoppers
top_review_comment: Truth is, it's just a wine stopper, BUT it is beautiful and perfect the son who grew up loving dinosaurs. Buying another for another son.

name: Elements Photo Card Deck
top_review_headline: Will be getting a set for daughter as well!
top_review_comment: Fun and interactive.

name: Paint with Bob Ross Mug
top_review_comment: Good quality. Happy with purchase.

name: Retro Cardboard Instant Camera
top_review_headline: Probably one of my favorite cameras
top_review_comment: I see several complaints about the crank. I ran into this issue after going through a little over 100 sheets of film (ten cassettes worth) and it failed on me because I didn't crank it all the way to the starting position before loading the film. It was an easy 10 minute fix to get it back up and running. The camera itself is a ton of fun to use. You have to really think about every shot and really think about your lighting and the exposure triangle. Personally I use a light meter when I'm shooting with the jollylook camera!

name: Glow in the Dark Unicorn Putty
top_review_headline: I have purchased this product for multiple people.
top_review_comment: This putty is fun and has sparkles. Easy to mold and has a nice feel. It is lite in color -And I worry it may start to look dirty

top_review_headline: i would buy this product again

name: Personalized Puzzles Book
top_review_headline: Really fun variety of puzzles at just the right level
top_review_comment: I like the variety of puzzles that I can skip between. They have a good level of difficulty that is moderately challenging with without being discouragingly difficult. Some of the crosswords don't have a lot of overlap between the answers making some clues hard to solve.

name: Fidget Blocks
top_review_comment: I'd ordered several other items, and added this at the last minute (with no specific recipient in mind) because it looked as if it might amuse various ages, should I need a last-minute addition.

name: Frankenstein Switch Plate
top_review_comment: I hope our son-in-law illuminates the room like a boss with this magnificent switch.
